title: EPC Templates Available
body:
EPC Templates Available
  MediRecords holds a number of templates that are available for use with your EPC needs. This article will demonstrate how to access them.

After Opening the Patient Record, click on Clinical.

Click on the Extended Care section.



You will be shown the Extended Care screen.



Clicking on New EPC will show you the templates available.



EPC templates fall under two categories: Health Assessment and Reviews. 

INR



Medication Review



K-10 Assessment



Diabetes



Mini-Mental Health



AQoL-4D

 You should now have a brief understanding of the EPC templates that are available. If this is not what you're looking for, head back to our knowledge base and search for another article.

For assistance, please contact MediRecords support on 1300 103 903 during business hours OR email Support@medirecords.com
